display_help: Logging out in the Shadow Shard will grant you a Jetpack power for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of thirty minutes. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Dimensional Explorer Day Job badge.
display_target_help: Logging out in the Shadow Shard will grant you a Jetpack power for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of thirty minutes. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Dimensional Explorer Day Job badge.
